text: Angel on the Right (, translit. Farishtai kitfi rost) is a 2002 Tajik Swiss French Italian comedy-drama movie directed by Jamshed Usmonov and starring Uktamoi Miyasarova, Maruf Pulodzoda, Kova Tilavpur, Mardonkul Kulbobo, Malohat Maqsumova. == Other websites == * Category:2002 comedy-drama movies Category:Tajik movies Category:Swiss comedy movies Category:Swiss drama movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian drama movies
title: Angel on the Right
